name: Race To The Sea
description:
DESCRIPTION

Race To The Sea is a free advergame that you can play on any device, made for the release of the album "The War To End All Wars" by SABATON.

On October 27, 1914, orders from King Albert were given to open the sluice gates on the coast at Nieuwpoort that flooded the area between the Yser River and the Railway Embankment. On October 30, a German attack crossed the embankment but was repelled.

Hit the barrels to flood the field.

Collect Sabaton icons to own the power.

CONTROLS

Click or tap to jump and double jump!

PLAYABLE ON ANY DEVICE!

Official link: https://racetothesea.sabaton.net/

CREDITS

Game Design - Claudio Cimini, Pasquale Moretti

Game Developer - Claudio Cimini

Visual Designer - Pasquale Moretti

Directors - Alekos Konstantinou Florian Ummenhofer, Tiffany Cantegrel, Jasmin Mrozek

Production: Nuclear blast

Music by:

SABATON – Race To The Sea
